inlineContent.text: We‚Äôll show you how to use samples to train a custom text classifier or word tagger to extract important pieces of information out of text‚Äî all powered by the transfer learning algorithms in Natural Language. Find out how you can create apps that can answer user questions, recognize similarities in text, and find relevant documents, images, and more.

To get the most out of this session, you should have a basic understanding of the Natural Language framework. For an overview, watch ‚ÄúIntroducing Natural Language Framework‚Äù and ‚ÄúAdvances in Natural Language Framework.‚Äù You can also brush up on model training using Create ML through ‚ÄúIntroducing the Create ML App.‚Äù
Be the hero to change that by watching the video and providing notes! It‚Äôs super easy:

abstract.text: Explore how you can leverage the Natural Language framework to better analyze and understand text. Learn how to draw meaning from text using the framework‚Äôs built-in word and sentence embeddings, and how to create your own custom embeddings for specific needs.

metadata.title: Make apps smarter with Natural Language

abstract.text: Session notes shared by the community for the community.
